install.description: With only a little over a thousand 3.6l 964 Turbo's ever brought to the U.S., it was top priority to keep the new audio system completely stock looking.
This very desirable air-cooled 3.6l Turbo is all original and in pristine showroom condition, with only 10K original miles.
The original DIN opening received an Alpine CDA-9885 because of its great iPod interface and multi line display. Also the white Biolite display best matches the Porsche dash lights.

Stock speaker locations where upgraded with 6.5" MB Quart Premium components. The tweeter was mounted behind a modified original grille, while the oversized woofer hides behind the MB Quart grille which was dusted in a semi satin black for a factory look.
Here you see the MB Quart cross-over in the OEM location. The inside of the pocket had to be modified slightly to accommodate the larger piece.
A Genesis "Profile Four" amplifier was installed under the passenger seat. This amp fits perfectly, offers great sound quality, performance and reliability.
A ¼" piece of ABS Plastic was routed to accommodate a set of MB Quart 4 inch components as rear fill, while still being able to snap on the original grille. The original speaker was a 4x6 inch.
We choose the 4&qout; to be able to retain the factory grille for that unmolested look.
Unbelievable that this almost 14 year old car only has 10500 well documented miles on it.
Even the original intercooler looks brand new.
